body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes        See the raven statue in the yard, and listen to The Raven on CD in the Reading Room.  It's all free! NPS photo       Admission is free. The site is open Friday to Sunday, from 9am - 12noon and 1pm - 5pm.  Looking for National Park Service passes? The Edgar Allan Poe National Historic Site does not issue those. See this list of agencies that issue the America the Beautiful passes.
